pp2.5:13.1: ussāraṇaññeva → ussādanaṃ yeva (bj, pts-vp-pli1); ussādanaññeva (sya-all, mr)
pp2.5:17.1: sandhāretuṃ → santānetuṃ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | āvikatvā → āvīkatvā (bj)
pp2.5:21.1: ussāraṇaññeva → ussādanaṃyeva (bj, pts-vp-pli1); ussādanaññeva (sya-all) | sandhāretuṃ → santānetuṃ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
pp2.5:31.2: appicchataṃyeva → appicchaṃyeva (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | idamatthitaṃyeva → idamaṭṭhitaṃ yeva (bj); idamaṭṭhikaṃyeva (pts-vp-pli1)
